description: Deliver high-quality, robust production code for a diverse array of projects for clients including Harvard Business School, Everytown for Gun Safety, Pratt Institute, KoalaHealth, Vanderbilt University, The 19th News, and more.Provide leadership within engineering department through closecollaboration, knowledge shares, and mentorship.
